title: Happy Life Forever
privacyPolicyContent:
Privacy Policy: BMI Calculator Pro does not require user registration and does not share personal data with anyone.

 We use Google Analytics and crash reports to improve the app. 

 By using this app, you agree to our privacy policy.
normal_weight_description: You are at a healthy weight; focus on maintaining it by following a balanced lifestyle. Consult a qualified physician or nutritionist before making any significant diet or lifestyle changes.
normal_weight_diet: Encouraged to eat a balanced diet that includes plenty of fruits, vegetables, and lean protein.
normal_weight_exercise: Mix cardio and strength training exercises to maintain your current fitness level.
normal_weight_lifestyle: Establish realistic health goals to stay motivated.
obese_description: Your weight is becoming a health risk; take the necessary steps to address it, but consult a qualified doctor before making any changes.
obese_diet: You are encouraged to take a well-planned diet food chart. Your food chart should focus on high-fiber, low-calorie foods.
obese_exercise: We recommend you start with low-impact exercises like walking or swimming to reduce strain on joints.
obese_lifestyle: You are strongly recommended to consult a healthcare specialist.
overweight_description: You are gaining extra weight. Follow the necessary steps:
overweight_diet: Encouraged to eat a balanced diet rich in fruits and vegetables.
overweight_exercise: You need to take some extra exercise to lose some weight.
overweight_lifestyle: You are suggested for regular monitoring of blood pressure, cholesterol levels, and blood sugar.
seriously_obese_description: Your weight is in a risky stage. Please follow the necessary steps:
seriously_obese_diet: You are strongly advised to take a diet chart from a professional.
seriously_obese_exercise: Take a proper exercise chart from a professional.
seriously_obese_lifestyle: Advice to live under the surveillance of a professional doctor.
underweight_diet: Eat high-nutrient foods regularly and take requested meals to gain some weight.
underweight_exercise: Do some strength training to build muscle. Try to avoid cardio exercises.
underweight_lifestyle: You are recommended to take counseling from a health specialist to gain proper weight.
perfect_weight: You’re at a healthy weight; just maintain it by following a balanced lifestyle, and be sure to consult a qualified doctor before making any changes.
mix_exercise: You are suggested to mix cardio and strength training exercise to maintain your current fitness.
fit_in_weight: Adopt a balanced diet, stay active, prioritize sleep, manage stress, avoid smoking and excessive alcohol, and maintain regular health check-ups to sustain a healthy lifestyle.
exercise_recommendation: We recommend mixing cardio and strength training exercises.

You need to gain some weight. You can fo: To gain weight, consider these steps. However, it’s essential to consult a qualified doctor before implementing any advice:
Do some strength training to build muscl: Focus on strength training to build muscle and limit cardio exercises.
You are recommended to take counseling f: Consider consulting a health specialist for effective weight gain strategies.

Privacy Policy: BMI Calculator Pro does not require user registration and does not share personal data with anyone.

 We use Google Analytics and crash reports to improve the app. 

 By using this app, you agree to our privacy policy.
underweight_description: To gain weight healthily, do so safely and sustainably. Follow these guidelines, but consult a qualified physician or nutritionist before making major diet or lifestyle changes.
Eat high-nutrient foods regularly and ta: To gain weight, regularly eat high-nutrient foods and seek meal suggestions.
